attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been reported that Alconbury Truckstop is to close. This facility is vital as the only "secure" parking for trucks along the crime ridden A14 corridor.

If NT are to sell, it has to be for the Dept of Transport to ensure it continues as a truckstop.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
